|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 002e |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PPD-AR5B197 |icid = 4104A-AR5B197 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Atheros;AR9287; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/25/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ''[[:File:AR9002WB-2NG.pdf|AR9002WB-2NG.pdf]] Mini PCIe (half-size) card reference design'', aka '''WB197''' :Combo card - Wi-Fi ('''AR9287''') 2x2 bgn + Bluetooth ('''AR3011''')
This device is manufactured by '''Lite-On''' as the WCBN607AH. :68:A3:C4 OUI This device is manufactured by '''Askey'''. :"3017-009900" is silkscreened on the back of the card. :00:26:B6 OUI
